reviews.review: Good story

Decided to write a review for not only this game, but the series total of the 1st and 2nd games. This game is truly a [b]masterpiece[/b], and I do not think I could ever love a game more than I do the Portal series. After becoming a huge fan of this game a year or two later after its release, I played it many times over, and even had 2 Portal-themed birthdays and owned a plethora of Portal merchandise plastered all over my room.

I had a sudden urge to go back and play the game after many years from my other playthroughs, and I was [i]not[/i] disappointed. This game has some of the best art, graphics, voice acting, gameplay, lore and story of its entire decade. It truly was even better than I had recalled, and it might possibly be my favorite game ever. Because of this, I was intensely compelled to write this review, and am so glad I was able to enjoy this game.

TL;DR: Best game [b]EVER[/b].

I beat this on my xbox, and have played co op on computer with my friends. Honestly, one of my favorite games of all time. It's not a game I find myself playing a lot, but this game and the first game are among my favorite puzzle games, and this game has so many great moments and the puzzles are all super fun. Plus that ending gets me every time. So good. If you haven't played it yet, and aren't sure if you should, just play it. It's great. Maybe a little long towards the end of the single player campaign, but that's a minor complaint for the good laughs you'll get from the dialogue and the fun of the puzzles you go through.
Its awesome :)
Yes.

Perhaps the most clever writing and story ever seen in video game format, not to mention the amazing gameplay where you have to solve puzzles using dope portals. I've been a huge fan of Valve ever since the original release of Half Life 2 and have been buying and playing all of their games ever since. Honestly the best video game company in the industry at the moment (apart from a few indie companies) and probably the best game of all time. I cannot recommend this game enough to anyone and everyone. The first game was pretty great too, play that one first.
非常好玩

I amazed by the developers who have figured it out how Portal Physics works. And I was just found out the theory behind it then my mind goes boom after that. btw I still playing this game in 2020 and it's really a fun game actually.
Fun extension to the original game. A lot more levels and more creative thinking needed

An extremely well thought out game, with absolutely great puzzle solving accompanied by witty dialogue from the two main characters. I recommend that you play through the first Portal before this one, in ordre to understand the mechanics and a bit of the story. Very satisfying to play through, and even to replay every few years!
Another fun and silly puzzle game that's even better than the first one.

优秀的剧情！无处不在的惊喜！镜头视角的优化比第一代进步明显。两位配音演员优秀的出演和出色的台本为角色赋予了灵魂，让人难忘。而在关卡设计中，谜题难度的递增程度十分合理，而在本作中后期的（剧透提醒）[spoiler] 旧实验室 [/spoiler] 是本作环境氛围营造的最好，也是剧情推动最多的部分。
9.5/10

Great game. The story is amazing, the gameplay is a step up from its predecessor in my opinion. The game is a full length title now, so you get more game for your money. The replayability of the game is also fantastic, as you will pick up on jokes and little things that you didn't notice before (same with Portal 1).
